public class LinpTemplate
extends TemplateBase

execSqlQuery

public <E> List<E> execSqlQuery(Class<E> clazz,
                                String sql,
                                Object... params)
Executes a sql query. Use '?' in sql statement to define an query parameter. (Select * From person where id = ?)

Specified by:
execSqlQuery in interface PersistenceTemplate
Parameters:
clazz - bean type expected for result mapping.
sql - sql query statement.
params - arguments for query.
Returns:
list with bean instances populated of clazz argument type.
See Also:
BeanPopulator, MultLevelsBeanPopulator

execSqlQueryForObject

public <E> E execSqlQueryForObject(Class<E> clazz,
                                   String sql,
                                   Object... params)
                        throws NonUniqueRowException
Executes a sql query for unique object as result. Use '?' in sql statement to define an query parameter. (Select * From person where id = ?)

Specified by:
execSqlQueryForObject in interface PersistenceTemplate
Parameters:
clazz - bean type expected for result mapping.
sql - sql query statement.
params - arguments for query.
Returns:
bean instance populated of clazz argument type or null if the result is empty.
Throws:
NonUniqueRowException - if the query did return more than one row.
See Also:
BeanPopulator, MultLevelsBeanPopulator

execSqlUpdate

public int execSqlUpdate(String sql,
                         Object... params)
Executes a sql update. Use for delele, update and insert Use '?' to define an argument in sql statement (insert into person values(?,?,?))

Specified by:
execSqlUpdate in interface PersistenceTemplate
Parameters:
sql - sql update statement.
Returns:
number of affected records.

callFunction

public Map callFunction(SqlFunction function,
                        Map<String,Object> args)
Call a sql stored function.

Specified by:
callFunction in interface PersistenceTemplate
Parameters:
function - instante of SqlFunction to call.
args - map with 'in' procedure arguments the parameter name as key and the parameter value as map value.
Returns:
a map with out function parameters with the parameter name as key and the parameter value as map value. The default function result object key in result map is SqlFunction.DEFAULT_RESULT_NAME constant.
